text: Matthew Tyler Oakley (born March 22, 1989) is an American YouTuber, actor, activist and author. His activism has been dedicated to LGBTQ+ youth, LGBT rights, as well as social issues including health care, education, and the prevention of suicide among LGBT youth. He was born in Jackson, Michigan. Oakley began making videos in 2007. Oakley, who is openly gay, is a former member of the successful collaboration channel "5AwesomeGays," where he produced the Friday video for over three years. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:LGBT actors Category:American LGBT writers Category:Gay men Category:American YouTubers Category:American movie actors Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:American political commentators Category:American autobiographers Category:Writers from Michigan Category:Actors from Michigan Category:People from Jackson, Michigan Category:American bloggers Category:Twitch (service) streamers Category:Youth activists
title: Tyler Oakley
